title: Image and Multimodal Support
description: Support image input/output and multimodal interactions (vision, image generation).

title: Structured Output and JSON Mode
description: Support structured JSON output with schema validation and typed responses.

title: Agent Evaluation Framework
description: Integrate Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Evaluation for measuring agent response quality, accuracy, and performance.

title: Custom Native Plugins
description: Support native C# plugins using [KernelFunction] attributes alongside MCP tools.

title: OpenTelemetry Observability
description: Comprehensive distributed tracing, metrics, and logging with OpenTelemetry.

title: Additional MCP Servers
description: Integrate GitHub, SQLite, web browsing, and custom MCP tools for expanded capabilities.

title: Research and document available MCP servers
Multi-turn Planning
description: Complex task decomposition and execution across multiple turns with plan adaptation.

title: Azure AI Foundry Agents
description: Integrate with Azure AI Foundry for managed agent runtime and deployment.

title: Multiple Subagents Architecture
description: Enable specialized agents for different tasks (coding, research, planning) with intelligent routing between them.

title: Create specialized agent implementations (Coding, Research, Planning)
Update console UI for agent awareness
Memory and RAG
description: Long-term memory and retrieval-augmented generation for context beyond single conversations.

title: Prompt Iteration and Optimization
description: Data-driven prompt optimization based on evaluation metrics with A/B testing and versioning.
